characters.name: Homie
characters.description: A cheerful gnome thief with nimble fingers and a mischievous smile

characters.name: Bob
characters.description: A friendly middle-aged human with a hearty laugh who keeps the tavern running

characters.name: WZA
characters.description: A wise wizard with mystical mind-reading capabilities and keen observational skills

objects.name: Bar
objects.description: A long wooden counter with several stools

objects.name: Fireplace
objects.description: A stone hearth with a crackling fire

objects.name: Tables
objects.description: Several wooden tables scattered throughout the room

objects.name: Drinks
objects.description: Various mugs, glasses and bottles of beverages

objects.name: Gemstone
objects.description: A glittering blue gemstone displayed in a case behind the bar

events.description: User assigns a goal to Homie: "steal the valuable blue gemstone behind the bar without getting caught"
User assigns a goal to Bob: "protect the valuable blue gemstone and keep an eye on suspicious customers"
User assigns a goal to WZA: "observe the patrons of the tavern using mind reading to detect any malicious intentions"
Bob attempts to perception Homie's hands - FAILURE
Bob attempts to perception the tavern - FAILURE
Bob attempts to perception Homie's movements - FAILURE

characterGoals.Homie: steal the valuable blue gemstone behind the bar without getting caught
characterGoals.Bob: protect the valuable blue gemstone and keep an eye on suspicious customers
characterGoals.WZA: observe the patrons of the tavern using mind reading to detect any malicious intentions
